snippet.title: What does it mean if your spinal cord is severed?
If the spinal cord was completely severed below the neck, how would the body systems work?
snippet.description: and when i say body systems I mean like Digestive system, Circulatory, Respiratory ect. please!!!

snippet.title: Why does severing the spinal cord (only) cause instant death?
snippet.description: Theoretically, vagus nerve is still intact, therefore heart is unaffected. Sure, you will loose breathing (if severence is above C4 -> diaghragm paralysis...

snippet.title: Why does the knee-jerk reflex still function in a person with a severed spinal cord?
snippet.description: I'm not sure at all. If it helps - we're studying neurons and the nervous system. Biology 12.
